제목: 이상일 용인시장, 반도체 국가산단 이전론에 국가신뢰 훼손 우려

제목: Anthropic-funded group backs candidate attacked by rival AI super PAC
요약: Dueling pro-AI PACs have centered around backing or targeting one New York congressional bid: Alex Bores, whose RAISE Act requires AI developers to disclose safety protocols and report serious system misuse.
title: Anthropic-funded group backs candidate attacked by rival AI super PAC
summary: Dueling pro-AI PACs have centered around backing or targeting one New York congressional bid: Alex Bores, whose RAISE Act requires AI developers to disclose safety protocols and report serious system misuse.

제목: Apple’s iOS 26.4 arrives in public beta with AI music playlists, video podcasts, and more
요약: Several updates are introduced in iOS 26.4, including an AI-powered playlist-generation feature in Apple Music, support for video content in the Podcasts app, end-to-end encryption (E2EE) for RCS messages, and more.
title: Apple’s iOS 26.4 arrives in public beta with AI music playlists, video podcasts, and more
